task.summary: stateChnage save due to Toolbar animation
fix bugs on Category fab button
row_base_list_item defined & category creation issue fixed.
deck fragment is refined and now works.
some animation issue due to Adapter fixed.
Flashcard list update & it's adapter changed.
fix bugs on polygon for lower api devices
numeric indicator changed & nightMode UI added.
Toaster added & Text2Speech is working now.
text2Speech issue fixed & readme , travis is updated.
lint option added for resolve yml issue.
fix bug on Edit of flashcardList

MESSAGE.value: lint option added for resolve yml issue.
fix bug on Edit of flashcardList
